mapper.select: select no,title,contents,id,click,type,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date from list where del_yn="N" and type=#{type} order by no desc;
select no,title,introduce,id,click,pref,img,auth,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date from category where auth =#{auth};

select n.title,n.stitle,l.id,l.click as click, n.click as nclick,l.pref,n.sort,l.introduce, DATE_FORMAT(n.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as ndata from `category` as l inner join novel as n on(l.title=n.title) where l.title = #{title} order by n.sort desc
